event_registry_properties.name: action
event_registry_properties.item: Schedule a repair procedure to replace the affected resource(s), the identity of which can be determined using 'fmadm faulty'.
event_registry_properties.name: description
event_registry_properties.item: A CRC error has occurred in the interconnect between two CPU chips. While no data has been lost, a lane failover has taken place.
event_registry_properties.name: details
event_registry_properties.item: There is no more information available at this time.
event_registry_properties.name: impact
event_registry_properties.item: The system's capacity to correct transmission errors between CPU chips has been reduced.
event_registry_properties.name: response
event_registry_properties.item: The hardware has automatically reconfigured the link to isolate the failing lane, and successful retransmission of the data has occurred.
event_registry_properties.name: title
